underlying_goal: Analyze 2025 weekly meeting notes and create a C-Level performance evaluation PPT based on a provided template and last year's evaluation as reference
friction_detail: Claude struggled to generate a proper PPT, first trying LibreOffice then falling back to markdown which user rejected, then user had to interrupt again when the revised approach also stalled.
brief_summary: User wanted a 2025 performance evaluation PPT generated from weekly meeting notes using a template, but Claude couldn't produce the final deliverable after multiple approach failures and user interruptions.
